mainTask: Write an article about the benefits of meditation

agents.agentName: Agent for Research the scientific benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, etc.)
agents.taskAssigned: Research the scientific benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, etc.)

agents.agentName: Agent for Research different types of meditation (mindfulness, transcendental, etc.) and their specific benefits
agents.taskAssigned: Research different types of meditation (mindfulness, transcendental, etc.) and their specific benefits

agents.agentName: Agent for Research anecdotal evidence and personal experiences with meditation benefits
agents.taskAssigned: Research anecdotal evidence and personal experiences with meditation benefits

agents.agentName: Agent for Create an outline for the article, including introduction, body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit), and conclusion
agents.taskAssigned: Create an outline for the article, including introduction, body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit), and conclusion

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the introduction, explaining what meditation is and its potential benefits
agents.taskAssigned: Write the introduction, explaining what meditation is and its potential benefits

agents.agentName: Agent for Write body paragraphs, each focusing on a specific benefit (e.g., stress reduction, improved sleep, increased self-awareness)
agents.taskAssigned: Write body paragraphs, each focusing on a specific benefit (e.g., stress reduction, improved sleep, increased self-awareness)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the conclusion, summarizing the key benefits and encouraging readers to try meditation
agents.taskAssigned: Write the conclusion, summarizing the key benefits and encouraging readers to try meditation

agents.agentName: Agent for Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity
agents.taskAssigned: Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity

agents.agentName: Agent for Format the article for publication (add headings, subheadings, images, etc.)
agents.taskAssigned: Format the article for publication (add headings, subheadings, images, etc.)
